740.title: Lawsuit and class action waiver. Arbitration for dispute resolution in the United States

tosdr.case: You wave your right to a class action.
tosdr.tldr: a binding arbitration clause and class action waiver that affects how disputes with Microsoft will be resolved in the United States. This clause governs many of Microsoft's online services - including your Microsoft account and many of their online products and services for consumers, such as Hotmail, SkyDrive, Bing, MSN, Office.com, Windows Live Messenger, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Windows Mail Desktop, and Windows Writer.

833.title: No promise to inform of government requests

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Microsoft reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as Microsoft deems necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, or to edit, refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, in Microsoft's sole discretion.

1042.title: Your data may be stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr: Personal information collected on Microsoft sites and services may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates, subsidiaries or service providers maintain facilities.
